title: Responsive Navigation Shell
description: Create a navigation shell that switches between bottom navigation, navigation rail, and sidebar based on screen width.
instructions: Build a ResponsiveNavigationShell widget that wraps child content with appropriate navigation. For screens < 600px wide, use a BottomNavigationBar. For screens 600-900px, use a NavigationRail. For screens > 900px, use a NavigationDrawer (permanent sidebar). All navigation types should have the same 4 destinations: Home, Search, Favorites, Profile. The selected index and onDestinationSelected callback should be passed as parameters.

hints.text: Use LayoutBuilder and check constraints.maxWidth against breakpoints
Create separate methods for mobile, tablet, and desktop layouts for clarity
Store destination data in a list of records or objects to avoid repetition

commonMistakes.mistake: Using different navigation item counts for different sizes
commonMistakes.consequence: Navigation is inconsistent across device sizes
commonMistakes.correction: Define destinations once and reuse for all navigation types

commonMistakes.mistake: Forgetting VerticalDivider between navigation and content
commonMistakes.consequence: Navigation and content blend together visually
commonMistakes.correction: Add const VerticalDivider(thickness: 1, width: 1) between NavigationRail/Drawer and content
